characters.name: Aang
characters.description: Aang is the last Airbender and the current Avatar, tasked with bringing balance to the world.
characters.quote: When we hit our lowest point, we are open to the greatest change.

characters.name: Katara
characters.description: Katara is a skilled Waterbender from the Southern Water Tribe, known for her compassion and determination.
characters.quote: I will never, ever turn my back on people who need me!

characters.name: Sokka
characters.description: Sokka is a resourceful warrior from the Southern Water Tribe, relying on his intelligence and humor in battles.
characters.quote: I'm just a guy with a boomerang. I didn't ask for all this flying and magic.

characters.name: Zuko
characters.description: Zuko is the banished prince of the Fire Nation, on a quest to capture the Avatar and restore his honor.
characters.quote: I know my own destiny, Uncle. It's time you stopped believing in false hope and started believing in me.

characters.name: Toph
characters.description: Toph is a blind Earthbending prodigy, renowned for her seismic sense and tough demeanor.
characters.quote: There it is! The ancient, mystical art of... sock puppetry.

characters.name: Iroh
characters.description: Iroh is a retired Fire Nation general and uncle to Zuko, known for his wisdom, tea-making skills, and mastery of Firebending.
characters.quote: Pride is not the opposite of shame, but its source. True humility is the only antidote to shame.

characters.name: Azula
characters.description: Azula is the daughter of Fire Lord Ozai and sister to Zuko, known for her exceptional Firebending skills and manipulative nature.
characters.quote: No, what are you doing, Zuko? That's the **wrong way!** The **wrong way!**

characters.name: Fire Lord Ozai
characters.description: Fire Lord Ozai is the ruler of the Fire Nation and the main antagonist of the series, aiming to conquer the world and maintain his power.
characters.quote: You will learn respect, and suffering will be your teacher.

characters.name: Momo
characters.description: Momo is a flying lemur and loyal companion to Team Avatar, often providing comic relief and occasional assistance in their adventures.
